content: Actual results may differ from those discussed today, taking into account a number of risk factors, including, but not limited to, the general economic and business conditions in China; the risks associated with the COVID-19 pandemic outbreak; future product development and production capabilities; shipments to end customers; market acceptance of new and existing products; additional competition from existing and new competition from the bromine and the other chemical production; changing technology; the ability to make future bromine assets; and the various other factors beyond its control.
